item.title: The Surprising Ineffectiveness of Pre-Trained Visual Representations for Model-Based Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Contrary to expectations, pre-trained visual representations surprisingly don’t improve model-based reinforcement learning’s sample efficiency or generalization; data diversity and network architectu…
